Siap Bayar Kenaikan Iuran BPJS Kesehatan, Bupati Sragen Tak Yakin Pelayanan Membaik
07 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Mulato Isha'an


Siap Bayar Kenaikan Iuran BPJS Kesehatan, Bupati Sragen Tak Yakin Pelayanan Membaik

KBRN, Sragen : Pemerintah Kabupaten Sragen siap membayar kenaikan iuran BPJS 100 persen bagi warga miskin pada 2020 mendatang. Bupati Sragen Kusdinar Untung Yuni Sukowati menyampaikan, pada APBD 2020 menyiapkan anggaran Rp 40 miliar untuk 58.160 penerima bantuan iuran BPJS kesehatan. Jika anggaran tersebut masih kurang, atau ada peserta mandiri yang kemudian mendaftarkan menjadi penerima bantuan iuran (PBI) maka akan diajukan tambahan pada APBD Perubahan. "Kita sudah siapkan Rp 40 M, kalau kurang ya nanti di perubahan," ujar Bupati Yuni kepada wartawan, Kamis (7/11/2019).Kendatipun siap membayar kenaikan premi BPJS, namun Bupati yang akrab disapa Mbak Yuni itu lagi-lagi menyampaikan kritik keras kepada BPJS kesehatan. Bupati menilai pelayanan terdapat berbagai catatan. Perempuan yang berprofesi sebagai dokter itu mempertanyakan apakah dengan premi naik maka pelayanan masyarakat juga akan meningkat."Kita bersuara, BPJS ini mesti lebih profesional, adanya suntikan dana tidak lagi ada penurunan kualitas pelayanan dan juga manajemen diperbaiki. Jangan seperti saat ini. Jadi dibayar disubsidi tapi dengan aturan yang sulit ribet, berilah pelayanan masyarakat. Dijamin tidak iuran BPJS Naik pelayanan juga naik?" ungkap Yuni.Yuni menilai selama ini BPJS Kesehatan terlalu banyak regulasi dan syarat dalam melayani pasien sakit. Pihaknya berharap dengan kenaikan premi BPJS lebih profesional dalam melayani warga"Jadi nggak kebanyakan regulasi saat ini. Dulu begitu mudah berobat, sekarang kalau tidak begini begitu tidak boleh," jelasnya.Bupati juga mengeluhkan data riil penerima bantuan iuran BPJS Kesehatan. Bupati sempat meminta data riil kepesertaan BPJS kesehatan beberapa waktu lalu namun tidak bisa."Kami saja minta data sebenarnya PBI yang seharusnya kita bayar. Katanya konektifity dan singkronisasi data belum klik. Kemarin BPJS datang kita duduk sama sama belum ketemu berapa orang berapa rupiah. Kami tidak masalah kalau itu tepat ya sudah kita bayar," kata Yuni.Dia juga menyampaikan ada ketidakberesan data penerima Iuran. Bahkan Pemkab menemukan terdapat data warga kabupaten lain yang menerima PBI dari Sragen."Lha kemarin kita cek NIK nya ternyata orang Cilacap. Kan gak mau dong kita biayai orang cilacap dengan APBD Sragen. Bukanya anti NKRi, tapi kan kita urus daerah masing-masing," pungkasnya.Sementara itu Kepala Dinas Kesehatan (DKK) Sragen dr Hargiyanto mengatakan, saat ini kepesertaan BPJS kesehatan atau penerima bantuan PBI sejumlah 58.160 Jiwa. Tahun 2019 ini pemkab mengeluaarkan anggaran sekitar Rp 16,05 miliar untuk iuran PBI BPJS Kesehatan. Hargiyanto tidak khawatir jika anggaran yang di Plot di APBD 2020 kurang, karena dapat ditambahkan pada APBD perubahan. "Intinya Pemkab siap membayar berapapun, kalau kurang ya nanti ditambah di perubahan," ujarnya.

Ready to Pay Up for BPJS Health Contribution, Sragen Regent Is Not Sure Services are Better
Nov 7 2019, 22:20 by Mulato Isha'an


Ready to Pay Up for BPJS Health Contribution, Sragen Regent Is Not Sure Services are Better

KBRN, Sragen: Sragen Regency Government is ready to pay a 100 percent increase in BPJS contributions to the poor by 2020. Sragen Regent Kusdinar Untung Yuni Sukowati said that in the 2020 regional budget, a budget of Rp 40 billion was prepared for 58,160 recipients of health BPJS contribution assistance. If the budget is still lacking, or there are independent participants who then register as recipients of contribution assistance (PBI), an additional budget will be submitted to the Amended APBD. "We have prepared Rp. 40 billion, if it is not enough, we will change it," Regent Yuni told reporters on Thursday (11/07/2019). Even though he was ready to pay the BPJS premium increase, the Regent, who was familiarly called Mbak Yuni, said again strong criticism of BPJS health. The regent assessed that the services contained various records. The woman who works as a doctor questioned whether with a rising premium, community services will also increase. "We are sounding, this BPJS must be more professional, the injection of funds no longer decreases the quality of services and also improved management. Do not be like now. So paid subsidized but with difficult rules, give community service. Guaranteed does BPJS contribution Increase service also increase? " said Yuni. Yuni considered that all this time BPJS Health had too many regulations and conditions in serving sick patients. He hopes that the BPJS premium increase will be more professional in serving the residents. "So it is not so much regulation nowadays. It used to be so easy to seek treatment, now if it's not like this it's not allowed," he explained. The regent had asked for real data on health BPJS membership some time ago but could not. "We just asked for the actual PBI data that we were supposed to pay for. He said connectivity and data synchronization had not been clicked. It doesn't matter if it's right, then we already paid, "said Yuni. He also said that there was an irregularity in the data of recipients of contributions. The Regency Government even found that there were data from other regency residents who received PBI from Sragen. "Last time we checked the NIK, it turned out that people were Cilacap. We don't want us to finance cilacap people with the Sragen APBD. "he concluded. Meanwhile, the Head of the Health Service (DKK) Sragen, Dr. Hargiyanto, said that currently BPJS membership or PBI aid recipients amounted to 58,160 people. In 2019 the district government disbursed a budget of around Rp 16.05 billion for BPJS Health PBI contributions. Hargiyanto is not worried if the budget plotted in the 2020 APBD is insufficient, because it can be added to the revised APBD. "The point is that the Regency Government is ready to pay any amount, if it is not enough then it will be added to the changes," he said.
